soundUtilities

Class VoiceRecorder

  • java.lang.Object
    • soundUtilities.VoiceRecorder

  • public class VoiceRecorder
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains static methods to record the sounds coming from a microphone also to manipulate the recorded sounds
    Version:
    03/12/2016
    Author:
    Yahya Almardeny

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VoiceRecorder(Subjects subject)
      The constructor accepts parameter to determine the subject file and directory for the recorder sounds

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void deleteCurrentRecord()
      Delete Current Record
      static boolean finish()
      A static method stop and closes the target data line to finish capturing and recording if succeed returns true
      static java.io.File getWavFile()
      A getter method of the wavFile
      static void play()
      A static method to play the recorded sound
      static void resetWaveFile()
      Resets the wavFile to null
      static boolean start()
      Captures the sound and record it into a WAV file if it starts recording it returns true otherwise it returns false

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
